about.title: About Eventify
about.subtitle: Eventify is the event marketplace that connects organizers and attendees. Discover unforgettable experiences, host your own events, and sell tickets securely — all in one place.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: We make live experiences accessible and effortless. From intimate workshops to large-scale conferences and festivals, Eventify helps creators build, market, and grow their events while attendees enjoy a smooth discovery and checkout experience.

highlights.title: What you can do with Eventify

discover.title: Discover great events
discover.desc: Find concerts, conferences, meetups, and more with powerful search, categories, and personalized recommendations.

host.title: Host and manage
host.desc: Create event pages, set ticket tiers, manage capacity, and communicate with attendees with built-in tools.

tickets.title: Secure ticketing
tickets.desc: Fast checkout, QR-based entry, and fraud-resistant ticketing built for reliability at scale.

analytics.title: Insights and analytics
analytics.desc: Track sales, traffic, and attendance to optimize your marketing and maximize revenue.

marketplace.title: Vendor marketplace
marketplace.desc: Connect with partners, sponsors, and vendors to enhance your event experience.

meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Learn how Eventify collects, uses, and protects your data.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Eventify collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our services.

collection.title: Information we collect
collection.body: We collect information you provide (like name, email, profile details), transactional data (tickets purchased, payments), and usage data (device, log, and analytics data) to operate and improve Eventify.

use.title: How we use information
use.body: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process payments, prevent fraud, personalize content, and communicate with you about your account and events.

sharing.title: How we share information
sharing.body: We may share data with event organizers, service providers, payment processors, or when required by law. We do not sell your personal data.

security.title: Data security
security.body: We implement technical and organizational measures designed to protect your data. No method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.body: Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or restrict processing of your data. Contact us for requests.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.body: If you have questions about this policy or your data, please reach out.

meta.title: Terms of Service
meta.description: Understand the terms that govern your use of Eventify.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service govern your use of Eventify. By using the platform, you agree to these terms.

use.title: Use of the service
use.body: You agree to use Eventify in compliance with applicable laws and refrain from abusive, fraudulent, or infringing activity.

accounts.title: Accounts and security
accounts.body: You are responsible for your account credentials and activity. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

tickets.title: Tickets, payments, and refunds
tickets.body: Ticket sales, fees, and refund policies may vary by event and organizer. Eventify may facilitate payments but is not the seller unless stated otherwise.

liability.title: Limitation of liability
liability.body: To the extent permitted by law, Eventify is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.

changes.title: Changes to these terms
changes.body: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use after changes means you accept the updated terms.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.body: For questions about these terms, please contact us.
